statements: SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT id, usage_pattern FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT id, population_growth FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE population_growth > 1000;
SELECT id, usage_pattern, population_growth FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE usage_pattern > 100 ORDER BY population_growth DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE population_growth < 50 AND usage_pattern BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, SUM(usage_pattern) AS total_usage FROM water_demand_forecast GROUP BY id HAVING total_usage > 200;
SELECT AVG(population_growth) AS avg_growth FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT id, usage_pattern FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE population_growth > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, company_id, usage_pattern, population_growth FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_id, id, population_growth, usage_pattern FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE company_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT population, year, region FROM population_data WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT id, region, population FROM population_data WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_demand_forecast WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT id, company_id, JSON_LENGTH(usage_pattern) as pattern_length FROM water_demand_forecast ORDER BY pattern_length DESC;
SELECT population, year FROM population_data WHERE region = 'Asia' AND year > 2010;
SELECT company_id, AVG(population_growth) as avg_growth FROM water_demand_forecast GROUP BY company_id HAVING AVG(population_growth) > 0.05;
SELECT COUNT(id) as total_forecasts FROM water_demand_forecast;
SELECT * FROM WaterDemandForecast WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT location_id, usage_date, usage_volume FROM WaterDemandForecast WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT MAX(usage_volume), MIN(usage_volume) FROM WaterDemandForecast WHERE location_id = 2
SELECT usage_date, SUM(usage_volume) AS TotalVolume FROM WaterDemandForecast GROUP BY usage_date
SELECT * FROM HistoricalUsage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location_id, usage_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM WaterDemandForecast WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, usage_date FROM PopulationGrowth WHERE population_count > 50000;
SELECT usage_date, SUM(usage_volume) as total_volume FROM HistoricalUsage GROUP BY usage_date ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, year, population_count FROM PopulationGrowth WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalUsage WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM WaterDemandForecast WHERE population > 100000) ORDER BY usage_date;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, city, state, postal_code FROM Customer ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeter WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';
SELECT usage_id, meter_id, usage_date, gallons_used FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, city FROM Customer WHERE state='CA';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT Customer.customer_id, Customer.first_name, WaterMeter.installation_date, WaterMeter.location, WaterUsage.gallons_used FROM Customer JOIN WaterMeter ON Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterMeter.meter_id = WaterUsage.meter_id WHERE WaterUsage.usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Customer.first_name, Customer.last_name, Population.population_size, Population.population_growth_rate FROM Customer JOIN Population ON Customer.city = Population.city AND Customer.state = Population.state WHERE Population.population_size > 100000 ORDER BY Population.population_growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location, population_count FROM Population WHERE reporting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE gallons_used > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT location, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-06-01';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, population_count FROM Population ORDER BY population_count DESC;

SELECT u.username, w.gallons_used, p.location FROM Users u JOIN WaterUsage w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN Population p ON u.username = p.location WHERE w.usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Population WHERE reporting_date >= '2021-01-01' AND reporting_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value > 100000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
